config_main_menu:
Configuration
[0] Add new console
[1] Delete console
[2] Exit

Type number [0-2]?
type_console_ip: Type IP address of your console!
add_console:
Select your Game Console!
[0] Nintendo Switch
[1] Nintendo 3DS
[2] PS3
[3] PS4
[4] Others

Type number [0-4]?
delete_console:
Select console you want to delete (type [{}] to cancel)
Type number [0-{}]?
set_config_first:
First you have to run config.py(config.exe) to config.
Press enter to exit...
